name: Michael Winter 0001
content: Michael Winter Professor Department of Computer Science Brock University St. Catharines, Ontario, Canada, L2S 3A1 eMail: [email protected] Phone: +1 (905) 688-5550 ext. 3355 Managing Editor of Journal on Relational Methods in Computer Science - An electronic Journal - ISSN 1439-2275 (founded 04/17/00) Research Interests Fundamentals of programming languages Semantics of programming languages Program verification Program development Relational methods in computer science and mathematics Theory of relational structures (Allegories, Dedekind/Schröder categories, Relation Algebras) Theory of fuzzy relations Relational models of processes Qualitative spatial reasoning Mathematical Logic and Category Theory Publications Teaching Fall 2024 sick leave Winter 2025 COSC 2P05 - Programming Languages COSC 3P91 - Advanced Object-Oriented Programming COSC 5P02 - Logic in Computer Science sabbatical Current/Recent Student Projects Antwi, Robert: Compilation of a Functional Programming Language using Combinators, 2024-2026 (M.Sc.
